trans-unit.source: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en kryptografi neste generasjon (CNG) implementering av algoritmen Elliptic kurve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH).

trans-unit.source: This class is used to perform cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen brukes til å utføre kryptografiske operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: The ECDiffieHellmanCng class enables two parties to exchange private key material even if they are communicating through a public channel.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ECDiffieHellmanCng aktiverer to parter til exchange private nøkkelen materiale selv om de kommuniserer via en offentlig kanal.

trans-unit.source: Both parties can calculate the same secret value, which is referred to as the *secret agreement* in the managed Diffie-Hellman classes.
trans-unit.target: Begge parter kan beregne samme hemmelige-verdien som er referert til som den *hemmelig avtale* i forvaltet Diffie-Hellman klassene.

trans-unit.source: The secret agreement can then be used for a variety of purposes, including as a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: Hemmelig avtale kan deretter brukes for en rekke formål, inkludert som en symmetrisk nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: However, instead of exposing the secret agreement directly, the ECDiffieHellmanCng class does some post-processing on the agreement before providing the value.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for at hemmelig avtale direkte, støtter klassen ECDiffieHellmanCng noen etterbehandling i avtalen før du oppgir verdien.

trans-unit.source: This post processing is referred to as the *key derivation function (KDF)*; you can select which KDF you want to use and set its parameters through a set of properties on the instance of the Diffie-Hellman object.
trans-unit.target: Denne etterbehandling kalles i *for utledning-funksjonen (KDF)*; du kan velge hvilken KDF du vil bruke, og angi parameterne gjennom et sett med egenskaper for forekomsten av Diffie-Hellman-objektet.

trans-unit.source: |Key derivation function|Properties| |-----------------------------|----------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.HashAlgorithm%2A> - The hash algorithm that is used to process the secret agreement.
trans-unit.target: | Nøkkel utleding funksjonen | Egenskaper | |-----------------------------|----------------| | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>| <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.HashAlgorithm%2A>-Hash-algoritmen som brukes til å behandle hemmelig avtale.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.HashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A> - An optional byte array to prepend to the secret agreement before hashing it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A>– En valgfri bytematrise til sikkerhetskopifilnavnene hemmelige avtalen før nummer den.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A> - An optional byte array to append to the secret agreement before hashing it.| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.HashAlgorithm%2A> - The hash algorithm that is used to process the secret agreement.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A>– En valgfri bytematrise skal føyes til den hemmelige avtalen før nummer det. | | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>| <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.HashAlgorithm%2A>-Hash-algoritmen som brukes til å behandle hemmelig avtale.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.HashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A>- An optional byte array to prepend to the secret agreement before hashing it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A>– En valgfri bytematrise til sikkerhetskopifilnavnene hemmelige avtalen før nummer den.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretPrepend%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A> - An optional byte array to append to the secret agreement before hashing it.| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Label%2A> - The label for key derivation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A>– En valgfri bytematrise skal føyes til den hemmelige avtalen før nummer det. | | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>| <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Label%2A>-Etiketten for nøkkelen utledning.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Label%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.SecretAppend%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Seed%2A> - The seed for key derivation.| The result of passing the secret agreement through the key derivation function is a byte array that may be used as key material for your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Seed%2A>-Seed for nøkkelen utledning. | Resultatet av Kast hemmelig avtale via key utledning-funksjonen er en bytematrise som kan brukes som nøkkel materiale for programmet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Seed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of key material generated is dependent on the key derivation function; for example, SHA-256 will generate 256 bits of key material, whereas SHA-512 will generate 512 bits of key material.The basic flow of an ECDH key exchange is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte oppbygning key generert er avhengig av key utledning-funksjonen. for eksempel genererer SHA-256 256 biter key materiale, mens SHA 512 genererer 512 biter key oppbygning. Basic flyten av en ECDH nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel er som følger: 1.

trans-unit.source: Alice and Bob create a key pair to use for the Diffie-Hellman key exchange operation 2.
trans-unit.target: Anne og Bob kan du opprette et nøkkelpar skal brukes for Diffie-Hellman nøkkelutvekslingen operasjonen 2.

trans-unit.source: Alice and Bob configure the KDF using parameters the agree on.
trans-unit.target: Anne og Bob Konfigurer KDF ved hjelp av godtatt parametere på.

trans-unit.source: Alice sends Bob her public key.
trans-unit.target: Anne sender Bob fellesnøkkelen hennes.

trans-unit.source: Bob sends Alice his public key.
trans-unit.target: BOB sender Alice sin fellesnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Alice and Bob use each other's public keys to generate the secret agreement, and apply the KDF to the secret agreement to generate key material.
trans-unit.target: Anne Bob Bruk hverandre fellesnøkler til å generere hemmelige avtalen og bruke KDF hemmelige avtalen for å generere nøkkelen materiale.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"></xref> class with a random key pair.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"> </xref> klassen med et tilfeldig nøkkelpar.

trans-unit.source: The random key pair has a default public key length of 521 bits.
trans-unit.target: Tilfeldig nøkkelparet har en standard offentlig nøkkellengde på 521 biter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"></xref> class with a random key pair, using the specified key size.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"> </xref> klassen med et tilfeldig nøkkelpar, ved hjelp av den angitte nøkkelstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: The random key pair will have the public key length defined by the `keySize` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Tilfeldig nøkkelparet får offentlige nøkkellengden er definert av den `keySize` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The size of the key.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: Valid key sizes are 256, 384, and 521 bits.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldig er nøkkel 256, 384 og 521 biter.

trans-unit.source: keySize specifies an invalid length.
trans-unit.target: keySizeangir en ugyldig lengde.

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) classes are not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: Kryptografi neste generasjon (CNG) klasser støttes ikke på dette systemet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The key that will be used as input to the cryptographic operations performed by the current object.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen som brukes som inndata til de kryptografiske operasjonene som utføres av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: key does not specify an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm group.
trans-unit.target: keyangir ikke en elliptisk kurve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algoritmen gruppe.

trans-unit.source: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) classes are not supported on this system.
trans-unit.target: Kryptografi neste generasjon (CNG) klasser støttes ikke på dette systemet.

trans-unit.source: Derives bytes that can be used as a key using a hash function, given another party's public key, hash algorithm's name, a prepend value and an append value.
trans-unit.target: Utleder byte som kan brukes som en nøkkel med en hash-funksjonen gitt en tredjepart fellesnøkkel, hash-algoritmen navn, en prepend verdi og en append-verdi.

trans-unit.source: If the value of `secretPrepend` or `secretAppend` is `null`, they are treated as empty arrays.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for `secretPrepend` eller `secretAppend` er `null`, behandles de som tom matriser.

trans-unit.source: The other party's public key.
trans-unit.target: Den andres fellesnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to derive the key material.
trans-unit.target: Hash-algoritmen til å bruke avledes key materiale.

trans-unit.source: A value to prepend to the derived secret before hashing.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som sikkerhetskopifilnavnene avledede hemmeligheten før nummer.

trans-unit.source: A value to append to the derived secret before hashing.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som skal føyes til den utledede hemmeligheten før nummer.

trans-unit.source: The key material from the key exchange with the other party’s public key.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen materiale fra nøkkelutvekslingen med en annen krever fellesnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: otherPartyPublicKey is .
trans-unit.target: otherPartyPublicKeyis .

trans-unit.source: otherPartyPublicKey is not an ECDH key, or it is not the correct size.
trans-unit.target: otherPartyPublicKeyer ikke en ECDH nøkkel, eller det er ikke riktig størrelse.

trans-unit.source: -or- hashAlgorithm.
trans-unit.target: -or- hashAlgorithm.

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> eller <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre feil.

trans-unit.source: Derives bytes that can be used as a key using a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC).
trans-unit.target: Utleder byte som kan brukes som en nøkkel med en Hash-baserte Message Authentication Code (HMAC).

trans-unit.source: If the value of `secretPrepend` or `secretAppend` is `null`, they are treated as empty arrays.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for `secretPrepend` eller `secretAppend` er `null`, behandles de som tom matriser.

trans-unit.source: If the value of `hmacKey` is `null`, the result of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm will be used as the HMAC key.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for `hmacKey` er `null`, resultatet av algoritmen Elliptic kurve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) brukes som nøkkelen for HMAC.

trans-unit.source: The other party's public key.
trans-unit.target: Den andres fellesnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm to use to derive the key material.
trans-unit.target: Hash-algoritmen til å bruke avledes key materiale.

trans-unit.source: The key for the HMAC.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen for HMAC.

trans-unit.source: A value to prepend to the derived secret before hashing.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som sikkerhetskopifilnavnene avledede hemmeligheten før nummer.

trans-unit.source: A value to append to the derived secret before hashing.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som skal føyes til den utledede hemmeligheten før nummer.

trans-unit.source: The key material from the key exchange with the other party’s public key.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen materiale fra nøkkelutvekslingen med en annen krever fellesnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: otherPartyPublicKey is .
trans-unit.target: otherPartyPublicKeyis .

trans-unit.source: otherPartyPublicKey is not an ECDH key, or it is not the correct size.
trans-unit.target: otherPartyPublicKeyer ikke en ECDH nøkkel, eller det er ikke riktig størrelse.

trans-unit.source: -or- hashAlgorithm.
trans-unit.target: -or- hashAlgorithm.

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> eller <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre feil.

trans-unit.source: Derives the key material that is generated from the secret agreement between two parties, given a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> object that contains the second party's public key.
trans-unit.target: Avledes key materiale som er generert fra hemmelig avtale mellom to parter gitt en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"> </xref> objekt som inneholder den andre tredjeparter fellesnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the public part of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) key from the other party in the key exchange.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder den offentlige delen av elliptisk kurve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH)-nøkkelen fra motparten i nøkkelutvekslingen.

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the key material.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som inneholder key materiale.

trans-unit.source: This information is generated from the secret agreement that is calculated from the current object's private key and the specified public key.
trans-unit.target: Denne informasjonen blir generert fra hemmelige avtalen som beregnes fra det gjeldende objektet privat nøkkel og angitte fellesnøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: otherPartyPublicKey is .
trans-unit.target: otherPartyPublicKeyis .

trans-unit.source: otherPartyPublicKey is invalid.
trans-unit.target: otherPartyPublicKeyer ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: Either its <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.AlgorithmGroup*> property does not specify <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithmGroup.ECDiffieHellman*> or its key size does not match the key size of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Enten den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.AlgorithmGroup*> egenskapen er ikke angitt <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithmGroup.ECDiffieHellman*> eller dens nøkkelstørrelsen samsvarer ikke med nøkkelstørrelsen på denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: This object's <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction*> property specifies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"></xref> key derivation function, but either <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Label*> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Seed*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet <> </> *> egenskapen angir de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"> </xref> key utledning-funksjonen, men enten <> </> *> eller <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Seed*>er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.Seed*>

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre feil.

trans-unit.source: Derives the key material that is generated from the secret agreement between two parties, given an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey"></xref> object that contains the second party's public key.
trans-unit.target: Avledes key materiale som er generert fra hemmelig avtale mellom to parter gitt en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey"> </xref> objekt som inneholder den andre tredjeparter fellesnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: The public key from the other party in the key exchange.

trans-unit.target: otherPartyPublicKeyer ikke en nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Derives bytes that can be used as a key using a Transport Layer Security (TLS) Pseudo-Random Function (PRF) derivation algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Utleder byte som kan brukes som en nøkkel med en sikkerhet TLS (Transport Layer) Pseudo-Random funksjonen (PRF) utledning algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The other party's public key.
trans-unit.target: Den andres fellesnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: The ASCII-encoded PRF label.
trans-unit.target: ASCII-kodet PRF etiketten.

trans-unit.source: The 64-byte PRF seed.
trans-unit.target: 64-byte PRF utgangsverdi.

trans-unit.source: The key material from the key exchange with the other party’s public key.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen materiale fra nøkkelutvekslingen med en annen krever fellesnøkkel.

trans-unit.target: otherPartyPublicKeyis .

trans-unit.target: -or- prfSeed is .

trans-unit.target: prfSeeder ikke nøyaktig 64 byte.

trans-unit.source: To deserialize an XML key, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.FromXmlString%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat%29> overload instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil deserialisere en XML-nøkkel, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.FromXmlString%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat%29>overbelaste i stedet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.FromXmlString%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat%29>

trans-unit.source: The XML-based key information to be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: I XML-baserte nøkkelinformasjon deserialiseres.

trans-unit.source: This method was not overridden for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er ikke overstyres for denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Deserializes the key information from an XML string by using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: Deserializes nøkkelinformasjon fra en XML-strengen ved hjelp av angitt format.

trans-unit.source: The XML-based key information to be deserialized.
trans-unit.target: I XML-baserte nøkkelinformasjon deserialiseres.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the format of the XML string.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som angir formatet for XML-strengen.

trans-unit.source: The only currently accepted format is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den eneste som er godkjent formatet <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: xmlis .

trans-unit.source: xml is malformed.
trans-unit.target: xmlhar feil format.

trans-unit.target: formatangir et ugyldig format.

trans-unit.source: The only accepted value is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den eneste aksepterte verdien er <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: All other errors.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre feil.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hash algorithm to use when generating key material.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir nummeralgoritmen skal brukes ved generering key materiale.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) objects only if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> value is set in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes bare hvis for kryptografi neste generasjon (CNG) objekter i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>eller <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>verdi er angitt i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>

trans-unit.source: This property accepts the following algorithms: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.MD5%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha1%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha256%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha384%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha512%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen godtar følgende algoritmer: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.MD5%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha1%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha256%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha384%2A>, og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha512%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha512%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha384%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha256%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha1%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.MD5%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other custom hash algorithms may also be used.
trans-unit.target: Andre tilpassede hash-algoritmer kan også brukes.

trans-unit.source: The default algorithm is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha256%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Standard-algoritmen er <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha256%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm.Sha256%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som angir hash-algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null." name="null." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Verdien er<xref uid="langword_csharp_null." name="null." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) key to use when deriving key material.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Hash-baserte Message Authentication Code (HMAC)-nøkkelen som brukes når det avledes key materiale.

trans-unit.source: This property applies only when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> value is set in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.UseSecretAgreementAsHmacKey%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare når den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>verdi er angitt i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A>egenskapen og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.UseSecretAgreementAsHmacKey%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.UseSecretAgreementAsHmacKey%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>

trans-unit.source: By default, the value is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er som standard `null`.

trans-unit.source: The Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) key to use when deriving key material.
trans-unit.target: Hash-baserte Message Authentication Code (HMAC)-nøkkelen som brukes når det avledes key materiale.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> that is used by the current object for cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"> </xref> som brukes av gjeldende objekt for kryptografiske operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: The key pair used by this object to perform cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelparet brukes av dette objektet til å utføre kryptografiske operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key derivation function for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir funksjonen key utledning for den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the key derivation function that is used to transform the secret agreement into key material.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir key utledning-funksjonen, som brukes til å transformere hemmelig avtale i nøkkelen materiale.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"></xref> enumeration values: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"></xref> enumeration values: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"></xref>, <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The enumeration value is out of range.
trans-unit.target: Opplistingsverdien er utenfor området.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the label value that is used for key derivation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir etikettverdien som brukes til viktige utledning.

trans-unit.source: This value is used for key derivation if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> value is set in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien brukes for nøkkelen utledning hvis den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>verdi er angitt i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>

trans-unit.source: By default, it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er det `null`.

trans-unit.source: The label value.
trans-unit.target: Etikettverdien.

trans-unit.source: Gets the public key that can be used by another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"></xref> object to generate a shared secret agreement.
trans-unit.target: Henter fellesnøkkelen som kan brukes av en annen <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"> </xref> objektet til å generere en delt hemmelig avtale.

trans-unit.source: The public key that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fellesnøkkelen som er knyttet til denne forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that will be appended to the secret agreement when generating key material.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som legges til hemmelig avtale ved generering av nøkkelen materiale.

trans-unit.source: This value is used for key derivation if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> key derivation function (KDF) is used.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien brukes for nøkkelen utledning hvis den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>eller <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>key utledning-funksjonen (KDF).</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>

trans-unit.source: The value is appended to the secret agreement, and the combined value is passed to the KDF to generate the key material.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som skal legges til i hemmelig avtale, og den kombinerte verdien som er sendt til KDF til å generere nøkkelen materiale.

trans-unit.source: By default, the value is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er som standard `null`.

trans-unit.source: The value that is appended to the secret agreement.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som skal legges til hemmelig avtale.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that will be added to the beginning of the secret agreement when deriving key material.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som legges til starten av hemmelig avtale når det avledes key materiale.

trans-unit.source: This value is used for key derivation if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A> property is set to one of the following values: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> The value is prepended to the secret agreement, and the combined value is passed to the key derivation function (KDF) to generate the key material.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien brukes for nøkkelen utledning hvis den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A>egenskapen settes til én av følgende verdier:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>verdien som er foran hemmelig avtale, og den kombinerte verdien som er sendt til funksjonen key utledning (KDF) til å generere nøkkelen materiale.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the value is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er som standard `null`.

trans-unit.source: The value that is appended to the beginning of the secret agreement during key derivation.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som skal legges til starten av den hemmelige avtalen under key utledning.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the seed value that will be used when deriving key material.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir seedverdi som skal brukes når det avledes key materiale.

trans-unit.source: This value is used for key derivation if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien brukes for nøkkelen utledning Hvis <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A>egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the value is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er som standard `null`.

trans-unit.source: The seed value.
trans-unit.target: Seedverdi.

trans-unit.source: This method is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er ikke implementert.

trans-unit.source: To convert the current key to an XML representation, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.ToXmlString%28System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat%29> overload instead.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å konvertere gjeldende nøkkel til en XML-representasjon av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.ToXmlString%28System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat%29>overbelaste i stedet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.ToXmlString%28System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat%29>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include private parameters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere private parametere; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Not applicable.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder ikke.

trans-unit.source: This method was not overridden for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er ikke overstyres for denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the key information to an XML string by using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: Serializes nøkkelinformasjon til en XML-strengen ved hjelp av angitt format.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the format of the XML string.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som angir formatet for XML-strengen.

trans-unit.source: The only currently accepted format is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den eneste som er godkjent formatet <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string object that contains the key information, serialized to an XML string, according to the requested format.
trans-unit.target: Strengobjekt som inneholder nøkkelinformasjon serialisert til en XML-streng, i henhold til det forespurte formatet.

trans-unit.source: format specifies an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: formatangir et ugyldig format.

trans-unit.source: The only accepted value is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den eneste aksepterte verdien er <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the secret agreement is used as a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) key to derive key material.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den hemmelige avtalen brukes som en Hash-baserte Message Authentication Code (HMAC) nøkkel avledes key materiale.

trans-unit.source: - This value is used for key derivation if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>.
trans-unit.target: -Denne verdien brukes for nøkkelen utledning Hvis <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A>egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanKeyDerivationFunction> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng.KeyDerivationFunction%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er som standard `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the secret agreement is used as an HMAC key to derive key material; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den hemmelige avtalen brukes som en nøkkel for HMAC avledes key materiale; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
